Name: RDP-Boinc
Overview: BOINC lets you contribute computing power on your home PC to projects doing research in many scientific areas. You can contribute to a single project, or to any combination of them. RDP-Boinc is a docker for the BOINC manager and client that can be accessed through RDP.
ModeratorComment: Deprecated in favour of the Boinc container from LinuxServer.io.  And, THANK-YOU for helping the cause
